attributes.action: “Restore democratic rights: run all postponed elections now.”
attributes.additional_details: “Millions of voters are being denied their say because of election delays tied to local government restructuring. This is unacceptable. Reforms must not silence democracy. We demand the government reinstate these elections and ensure citizens’ voices are heard without further delay.”
attributes.background: “Reverse the decision to postpone local and mayoral elections and reinstate them on their original schedule, ensuring democratic rights are upheld.”

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Stop the cancellation of Local Elections to help uphold democracy
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751384
